snippet: Bold but risky, cautious but clever. The European press was mulling what it thought on Saturday of Mitt Romney's choice of Paul D. Ryan as his running mate. Mostly they explained, "Paul who."
abstract: Bold but risky, cautious but clever. The European press was mulling what it thought on Saturday of Mitt Romney's choice of Paul D. Ryan as his running mate. Mostly they explained, "Paul who."

headline.main: What Europe Thinks of Paul Ryan
